name: Pixwheels
description:
Pixwheels

created for the lowrez jam 2020

This game is a demake of Pathological
by John-Paul Gignac - My thanks to him and everybody
else who contributed to Pathological. It is a great
game, and I encourage you to play it!
http://pathological.sourceforge.net

CONTROLS

PC: Arrows and XZ keys.
Mobile: On-screen DPAD and OX buttons

GOAL

Fill all the wheels with a single color. Once filled, the marbles disappear and the wheel is dimmed. The level is complete when all wheels are dimmed.

TUTORIAL

There is an in-game tutorial to guide you. If you want to reshow the tutorial text, open the options menu (RETURN key) and toggle the tutorial off-and-on again.

This is a late enry, made over the last 3 days and not as polished. The levels are likely unbalanced and I *hope* there are no bugs that
will crash the game. Enjoy!

Wez
